title: Coronation Street spoilers: Wedding day drama as Michelle seeks revenge on cheating Robert
text:
(Picture: Mark Campbell/MCPIX)

There are set to be some dramatic scenes ahead in Coronation Street, as Michelle Connor’s (Kym Marsh) wedding day arrives. Of course, with her already having discovered the truth about cheating fiancé Robert Preston (Tristan Gemmill), the question is: will the pair make it down the aisle?

Viewers have seen Michelle planning her big day, but — unbeknown to her — Robert is also secretly engaged to Vicky (Kerri Quinn). After an upcoming road-side accident leaves Robert fighting for his life, the truth about his secret double life is put at risk, as both Michelle and Vicky rush to be at their lover’s bedside.

Coronation Street has already confirmed that Michelle will discover the truth about her fiance’s double-life, and thus she’ll set out — with Carla (Alison King) by her side — to try and figure out what’s going on. It doesn’t take her long to do so, as she spots Robert publicly arguing with Vicky.

What happens after Michelle’s discovery remains to be seen, but it seems as if she’s set to go through with her plans to marry Robert — or, at the very least, get him up the aisle.

(Picture: Mark Campbell/MCPIX)

(Picture: Mark Campbell/MCPIX)

Actress Kym has been spotted filming in a wedding dress on-location, but the question is: is Michelle simply determined to get her happy ending with Robert? Or will she seek revenge on her cheating fiancé for all that he’s put her through?

In typical Corrie fashion, it’s set to be a big event, as several cobbles regulars including Carla and Jenny (Sally Ann Matthews) will all be present on the big day.

(Picture: Mark Campbell/MCPIX)

Weatherfield weddings have something of a habit for ending in disaster so — regardless of the outcome — there’s no doubt going to be incredibly dramatic scenes in store for viewers

The wedding scenes were filmed on location in Manchester and will be broadcast in December.

Kym recently took to Twitter to reveal how she’d received her final Corrie scripts, and — considering fellow actors Jennie McApline and Sally Ann Matthews have previewed the Christmas episodes after receiving their latest scripts, it’s likely that Michelle is set to depart around Christmas time.

If so, then this could suggest that the events of her wedding play an instrumental part in her decision to leave the cobbles.
